definition: to fall/to drop/to lag behind/to lose/to go missing/to reduce/fall (in prices)/to lose (value, weight etc)/to wag/to swing/to turn/to change/to exchange/to swap/to show off/to shed (hair)/(used after certain verbs to express completion, fulfillment, removal etc)
to revolve/to turn/to circle about/to walk about/classifier for revolutions (per minute etc): revs, rpm/classifier for repeated actions
to turn/to change direction/to transfer/to forward (mail)

sentences.english: The soldier turned his horse quickly and plunged into the river.
sentences.chinese: 士兵迅速掉轉馬頭，跳進河裏。

sentences.english: They turn the plane around to try again.
sentences.chinese: 他們將飛機掉轉方向重新試着着陸。

sentences.english: The dog saw it and run to his master as soon as it could.
sentences.chinese: 他的狗見了，急忙掉轉頭，追着主人狂奔。

sentences.english: The car turned round and went back again.
sentences.chinese: 小汽車掉轉頭又回去了。

sentences.english: Fred swung the wheel around to avoid hitting him.
sentences.chinese: 弗雷德掉轉方向盤避免撞到他。

sentences.english: Savoring the silence, we turned our horses around and they fell into a gallop.
sentences.chinese: 此時一片寂靜，我們掉轉馬頭，馬兒開始飛奔起來。

sentences.english: He changed his horse when he saw the ugly girl.
sentences.chinese: 他看見那個醜姑娘就掉轉馬頭。

sentences.english: This two brotherses drop to turn round and see his now and found out what things.
sentences.chinese: 這兩兄弟掉轉身來，看他現在又找到了什麼東西。
他們是如何掉轉方向的？

sentences.english: I would be whipping my head around to look at him.
sentences.chinese: 我也會掉轉我的頭左右去看他。

sentences.english: It is out of pity that you do not turn away your eyes.
sentences.chinese: 你不肯掉轉頭去不看我，那是出於憐憫。

sentences.english: The boat came close to the rocks and then sheered away.
sentences.chinese: 船靠近岩石時突然掉轉航向。

sentences.english: It turned and began following us.
sentences.chinese: 它掉轉頭，開始跟着我們。

sentences.english: Suddenly he halted, turned around and ran back to the woman.
sentences.chinese: 突然他停了下來，他掉轉頭奔向女人。

sentences.english: We turned the car round and steered for home.
sentences.chinese: 我們掉轉車頭，朝家駛去。

sentences.english: She turned the nozzle and the spray concentrated down to a stream.
sentences.chinese: 她掉轉噴嘴，讓水花集中噴入小河。
